subject: Harness Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: The return of the $1 million International Trot to Yonkers Raceway after a 20-year absence has more to do with attempting to resuscitate an ailing industry than the competitive spirit.
snippet: The return of the $1 million International Trot to Yonkers Raceway after a 20-year absence has more to do with attempting to resuscitate an ailing industry than the competitive spirit.
